contextId.information: The women had wings that looked like stork's wings. A stork is a type of large bird that has a wingspan of 2 to 4 meters. (See: [[:en:ta:vol1:translate:figs_simile]])
contextId.quote: they had wings like a stork's wings

contextId.information: AT: "They made up their minds to reject Yahweh's messages" (See: [[:en:ta:vol1:translate:figs_simile]])
contextId.quote: They made their hearts as hard as rock

contextId.information: AT: "in our land they will be like beautiful stones in a crown" (See: [[:en:ta:vol1:translate:figs_simile]])
contextId.quote: for they will be the jewels of a crown

contextId.information: AT: "the people do not know which way to go" (See: [[:en:ta:vol1:translate:figs_simile]])
AT: "will give them my mighty fearless strength" (See: [[:en:ta:vol1:translate:figs_simile]])
contextId.quote: make them like his warhorse in battle

contextId.information: AT: "I will make the people of Judah strong" (See: [[:en:ta:vol1:translate:figs_simile]])
contextId.quote: I will strengthen the house of Judah

contextId.information: "Ephraim" refers here to the northern kingdom of Israel. AT: "Ephraim will be very strong" (See: [[:en:ta:vol1:translate:figs_simile]])
contextId.quote: Ephraim will be like a warrior

contextId.information: "like firepots among stacked firewood ... unharvested stalks of grain standing in a field" (See: [[:en:ta:vol1:translate:figs_simile]])
contextId.quote: like firepots among wood ... standing grain
